original_title: 自己犠牲の女 岡田ひなの
overview: "I like a pure and honest woman. Such a woman receives an unexpected humiliation, feels unbearably frustrating, and still has to lick my body while soaking her pussy. I want one."... A woman that Kirisaki has his eyes on after receiving a request from a maniac. It was Manami, a young wife who lives happily with her husband, albeit mediocre.
title: Self-sacrificing woman Hinano Okada
